name: Steel Pulse
description: '''Steel Pulse''' are a [[roots reggae]] band from the [[Handsworth, West Midlands|Handsworth]] area of [[Birmingham]], England. They originally formed at Handsworth Wood Boys School, and were composed of [[David Hinds]] (lead vocals, guitar), [[Basil Gabbidon]] (lead guitar, vocals), and [[Ronald McQueen]] (bass); along with Basil's brother Colin briefly on drums and Mykaell Riley (vocals, percussion). Steel Pulse were the first non-Jamaican act to win the [[Grammy Award for Best Reggae Album]]. Collectively the band has won one Grammy award with nine nominations.
